algorithm_technique: Iterate through password, checking length, character types, and adjacent characters.
problem_summary_simple: Check if a password meets all strength criteria: length, character types, and no adjacent duplicates.
problem_summary_technical: Validates password against length, presence of lowercase, uppercase, digit, special chars, and no adjacent identical characters.
key_insights: The problem can be solved by checking each condition independently.
Using a set for special characters allows for efficient O(1) lookups.
The adjacent character check requires a single pass through the string.
